permissions.title: Permissions

onMention: <:chino_rawr:751215250245943318> **|** Hello {{0}}. My prefix in this guild is `{{1}}`. If you want to see what I can do, use `{{1}}help`.
missingBotPermission: I don't have the `{{perm}}` permission. Check my permissions/roles and try again.
missingUserPermission: you don't have the `{{perm}}` permission. You can't execute this command.
invalidUser: user not found. Make sure you have @mentioned them, or check the ID.
invalidRole: role not found. Make sure you have @mentioned it, or check the ID.
invalidEmoji: emoji not found, are you sure if this emoji is from this guild?
missingArgs: Invalid arguments! Use `{{prefix}}{{commandName}}` to see the correct usage.

addedToGuild.description:
Whoa {{0}}! Thanks for adding me in `{{1}}`, let me introduce myself.

I'm a little bot with many functions that can be useful, like... **Moderation**, **fun**, **music** and **utilities**. By default, my prefix is `{{2}}`

If you need help, then join in my support server using `{{2}}help` or `{{2}}invite`. Have fun and see you later.
addedToGuild.guildSaved: O servidor {{0}} foi adicionado à database com sucesso!

noAliases: This command doesn't have any aliases.

voice.minVolume: calm down! The minimal volume allowed is `5`.

guildban.title: Guild Banned
guildban.explain: `{{0}}` is banned, you can see the reason of the ban below. Do you think the ban was unjust? Join my [support server](https://discord.gg/CAm9cSU) and maybe get him/her unbanned.
